title: Bag Face, mid–late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: satin, chain and knot stitch embroidery
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: At center, a young man and woman fishing, a lady reclining and a man lying beside her, face down. Faces, hair and hats are painted. The scene is framed by delicate twining ribbons with foliage.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bag Face, mid–late 18th century.
mid–late 18th century. Medium: silk
Technique: satin, chain and knot stitch embroidery. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-52-15.
